# claude-code-lsp

Hooks-based LSP integration for Claude Code (no MCP).

What it does:
- keeps LSP daemon alive for session
- runs per-edit diagnostics after `Write/Edit/MultiEdit`
- stops daemon on session end
- inspired by `sst/opencode` LSP design

## Install (from GitHub marketplace repo)

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add w00ing/claude-code-lsp
claude plugin install claude-code-lsp@claude-code-lsp --scope project
```

## Configure seeds (optional)

Warmup runs only if you set seeds:

- env: `CLAUDE_LSP_SEED_FILES="path1 path2 ..."`
- or file in project root: `.claude-lsp-seeds` (one path per line)

## Tune wait

`LSP_QUERY_HOOK_WAIT_MS=3000` (default). Set higher if TS init slow.

## Debug

```bash
claude --debug hooks
```

## Manual command

- `/lsp ...` (uses `lsp-query`)

## Docs

- `../../docs/IMPLEMENTATION.md`
